public class UriBuilder
extends java.util.ArrayList<org.jvnet.ws.wadl.util.UriSegment>

Utility class for building a URI from a list or path segments, matrix parameters and query parameters

Method Detail

addPathSegment

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> addPathSegment(java.lang.String path)
Add a path segment.

Parameters:
path - a URI path segment
Returns:
a list to which the names of any matrix parameters for the path segment should be added.

buildUri

public java.lang.String buildUri(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> uriParams,
                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> queryParams)
Build a request URI

Parameters:
uriParams - a map of template and matrix parameter names to values. Values may be of any class, the object's toString method is used to produce a stringified value when embedded in the resource's URI.
queryParams - a map of query parameter names to values. Values may be of any class, the object's toString method is used to produce a stringified value when embedded in the resource's URI.
Returns:
the URI as a String
